brief_title: Two Investigational Drugs in Patients With Mixed Hyperlipidemia (0653-036)
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the cholesterol lowering effectiveness and safety of two investigational drugs in patients with mixed hyperlipidemia (high cholesterol and high triglycerides).
detailed_description: The duration of treatment is 18 weeks.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - High cholesterol and high triglycerides Exclusion Criteria: - Patient has a condition which, in the opinion of the investigator, might pose a risk to the patient, interfere with participation in the study, or does not meet the additional criteria as required by the study
